# isNotificationEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean indicating whether the characteristic has been set to send notifications.

## Declaration

```swift
var isNotificationEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

HomeKit delivers notifications to the accessory delegate using the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryDelegate/accessory(_:service:didUpdateValueFor:)] method.

## Receiving change notifications

- **enableNotification(_:completionHandler:)**: Enables or disables notifications for changes in the value of the characteristic.
